definition: having ones attention or mind or energy engaged
details:
adjective
- having ones attention or mind or energy engaged
= synonyms: occupied
- built against or attached to a wall
= example: built against or attached to a wall
- having services contracted for
= example: having services contracted for
- (used of toothed parts or gears) interlocked and interacting
= example: (used of toothed parts or gears) interlocked and interacting
= synonyms: intermeshed
- involved in military hostilities
= example: involved in military hostilities
- (of facilities such as telephones or lavatories) unavailable for use by anyone else or indicating unavailability
= example: (of facilities such as telephones or lavatories) unavailable for use by anyone else or indicating unavailability
= synonyms: busy
- reserved in advance
= synonyms: booked, set-aside
